General.Name: CordovaCann Corp
General.Description: CordovaCann Corp. engages in identifying, funding, developing, and managing operations in the cannabis value chain business. As of February 14, 2022, it operated 14 stores under the Star Buds Cannabis Co. brand in Ontario, Manitoba, Alberta, and British Columbia, Canada, as well as Oregon and Washington, the United States. The company was formerly known as LiveReel Media Corporation and changed its name to CordovaCann Corp. in January 2018. CordovaCann Corp. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 217 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 0R2

1.Name: Mr. Ashish  Kapoor C.A., C.F.A., CPA, CA, CFA, CPA
